name: SAMVEDNA disABLED PERSONS SOCIAL WELFARE TRUST

address: Opp. Ambaji Temple, Water Tank Hathi Khana road,

briefDescription: “SAMVEDNA” do not believe in shredding tears or flourish in charity for Aids and appliances but we collectively believe in “EMPOWERING them through employment or self-employment and share their “VEDNA” having SAME+VEDNA = “SAMVEDNA”.  With this intension  came forward to assist PWD in arranging placement at proper place.Under “MISSION EMPOWERMENT” organize job fairs and assisting PWD in getting proper placement.  Till date we organized 3 Job Fairs,  wherein 99 Industries having 357 vacancies came forward to give placement, for which 2500 PWDs took opportunity.  Amongst them 297 got selected.PWD who need support for self-employment, We provide them tool, machineries, kits & Aids for earning their livelihood.We market their self made commodities and articles too thus assist them getting sales.“SAMVEDNA” understands and feels these sensations thus came forward to accept the “SOCIAL OBLIGATIONS” to assist this community in searching life mate i.e. “JEEVAN SATHI”As a result of this event the engaged willing couples are finally enter into a "BANDHAN" i.e. marriage. For them we also arrange mass marriage i.e. Samuh Lagna, and we honour all these couples ‘KANYADAN” giving all the needy routine basic items required for establishing life after marriage.
